DOC.brief_summary: To investigate vessel resection reconstruction biliary tract cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Vessel Resection Reconstruction Biliary Tract Cancers
DOC.detailed_description: The vessel resection reconstruction hepatic artery portal vein biliary tract cancer surgery still controversial . In study , retrospectively evaluate diagnostic image , pathology , peri-operative event , recurrence , prognosis patient , multi-center surveillance .
DOC.criteria: Cases vessel resection reconstruction biliary tract cancer .
